Class: Aeroport

Aeroport(name, terminals, gates)

represents a aeroport that can hold aeroplanes

Constructor

new Aeroport(name, terminals, gates)

This creates a new aeroport with parameters
Parameters:
Name Type Description
name String the name of the aeroport
terminals Number the number of terminals
gates Number the number of gates per terminal
